channel.title: Ben Rivers on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ben Rivers on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Israel, Gaza, Iraq, Lebanon, Korea: Political and Dystopian Films in the Locarno Spotlight
item.description: Israeli director’s Eran Kolirin latest, a film about a trip through Gaza, an Iraq nuclear talks drama and ‘Mare’s Nest’ are among the offerings likely to spark reflection and debate.
